title: Kayn = Aatrox Q, Illaoi Q, Flash, Zed R
body:
So the new champ looks like a mix of existing champs to me, what do you think?
Q = Aatrox Q
W = Illaoi Q
E = 2nd Flash (if you're near a wall)
R = Zed R

replies.body: His E isn't a bloody flash you nobhead. It's a one man version of Bard's magical journey.

lol, obviously it's *not* flash, just like the other skill comparisons I listed aren't *actually* their skills lol
But yes, Bard's skill would be a better comparison :)
My point is this champ is just a mash up of other champ's existing skills.
